actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution authorizing funds for the standing and select committees of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Authorizes such sums as may be necessary for the continuance of necessary committee projects, activities, operations, and services, including payment of staff salaries by each standing or select committee of the House of Representatives, for the period beginning January 3, 1980, and ending March 31, 1980. Authorizes each such committee, for each month during the specified period, to payments in amounts equal to nine percent of the total amount authorized for use by such committee during the first session of the 96th Congress. Directs that the funds authorized under this resolution shall cease on the effective date of the primary expense resolution adopted with respect to such committee.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing funds for the standing and select committees of the House of Representatives.
